name: Humble Donkey Kahn #remixmonth by Fumonoid
description: From @fumonoid on instagram. Iâ€™m a fan of donkey Kahn and this is spot on. Enjoy!
author: Borninfire138

reviews.text: Pretty decent strawberry banana but the banana is the dominant flavor here. I also get some bad off-notes from Banana Cream (TFA). I'd definitely prefer a more strawberry forward recipe.
This is a pretty good recipe, but I'm not sure if it tastes more like pink bubble gum or toothpaste.  :)
very high %. try the current mix and decide.
pretty good strawberry banana thanks bro
